name: OOPS: Octopus Only Postal Service
description:
Big Important Notice:

  • I have an awful error that makes the game basically unplayable. Sorry, all. :( If anyone has any suggestions to fix it, please comment or post. You can check out my source code here as well: https://github.com/aprildenise/mizjam1
  • Thanks for visiting, though! I hope to have a build that you will enjoy one day. <3

Info:

Hello all! This is my entry for Miz Jam 1! I'm not a part of the Miziziziz community, but I saw the premise of this jam and though it was interesting. It's officially my fourth game and my third game jam. The game itself is small, but I hope you enjoy. 

I may continue developing this after the jam, so I appreciate helpful ways to make it better, like bug catches or game design ideas. I'm also keeping track of any known bugs  to help in case you get stuck. Overall, thanks! :)

Controls:

You're an ex-monster, and now a one-octopus postal service employed by some mysterious boss. Complete the deliveries without too much destruction.

  • Press and hold the 1,2,3, and 4 keys (on your alphanumeric keyboard, not the numpad) to activate the corresponding tentacle. 
  • Use WASD to move.
  • Drag the mouse to move an activated tentacle.
  • Left click to make objects stick/unstick to an activated tentacle.

Known Bugs (to help your through if you get stuck):

  • Active tentacles will highlight on the SECOND activation, and continue working afterwards.

Credits:

  • Game by April Denise
  • Art and sprites by Kenney Game Assets
  • Music by jkfite01, OpenGameArt
